TopicTitle: [1.7.3] Exploration Rover System by A.S.E.T. v0.3 (04.08.19)

Articles.Content: Do you have JSI and JSI PartUtilities installed ?

Do you have JSI and JSI PartUtilities installed ?

Yes! I'm using both MOARdV & artwhaley's patches for 0.90 of RPM & PartUtilities.

Edited January 29, 2015 by The Space Man

Anyone around here who've gotten the RPM to work? I've installed the JSIPartUtilities fix which solved the issues with the wheels. But the CrewCarbine seats and monitors from JSI are all missing for me.

I also got the patch from MOARdv.
Did you get the ASET props pack? Sounds like you are missing that.

Did you get the ASET props pack? Sounds like you are missing that.

Where do I find that and where do I put it?

Spaces config has a typo in name:

GameData\ASET\ERS\Spaces\ERSinternals\ERSinternal .cfg

should be without "space" symbol:

GameData\ASET\ERS\Spaces\ERSinternals\ERSinternal.cfg

Also, throwing my 2 cents - if a person is absent there's a reason for that.

NB: forum engine adds a space after dot symbol... oh well...

Edited February 12, 2015 by Horus

Where do I find that and where do I put it?

The download link and instructions are in the OP. Look in the dependencies section.

The download link and instructions are in the OP. Look in the dependencies section.

Thanks, this solved my issue!!
so I downloaded the JSI part utilities update but now the iva shows up outside of the cabin in the SPH/VAB and on launch, and the wheels don't work at all I can toggle suspension but that's it

Did you get the updated Firespitter plugin ?

EDIT- Sent you a PM

Edited February 26, 2015 by Mecripp2
I got the one from the dependencies page but its still not working

I got the one from the dependencies page but its still not working

Don't know if you solved this in the mean time (it has been a while) but the OP hasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t been updated since October; the firespitter plug-in there is out of date. The firespitter OP also hasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t been updated for 0.90 so your best bet it to extract the .dll from a mod that is kept up to date. My go to mod for the firespitter.dll at the moment is RoverDude's MKS/OKS mod found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79588
The author of this baby has been kinda-sorta missing for quite some time. It's quite sad. That being said... it's unlikely that the OP will be updated for the dependencies and such.

Alexustas posted a new video on Youtube a while ago.

I $upport Alex, you should too, IMHO.
I love this rover its replaced my bobcat ones

Never noticed that new video. I love that new panel.

I'd use this thing exclusively if it wasn't for the fact that the wheels are still just using the stock wheel modules. I'd like to see those things converted to KF wheels.
Whould this mod still work?
Nodes are busted cant attach the pieces together

You might try this new JSIPartUtilities http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88366-0-24-2-JSIPartUtilities-a-mishmash-of-clever-things-to-do-with-parts?p=1899200&viewfull=1#post1899200

And here is a updated firespitter http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24551-Firespitter-propeller-plane-and-helicopter-parts-v6-3-5-%28Sep-1st%29-for-KSP-0-24-2?p=1887997&viewfull=1#post1887997

EDIT- I'm being to lazy to write a MM now so here is my uploaded folder and, I just build one and all worked fine https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/help/ASET.zip all, I did was added - on a couple of nodes

Edited May 3, 2015 by Mecripp2
Hi. I'm not disappeared. I have spent a lot time to adapt my mods to new versions of KSP and PRM and will release updates as soon as completely write the description.
Alexustas you legend so pleased to see you I love this mod as well as all your others I have them all so glad your back and updating stuff will wait in anticipation
Great news!
This is greaat new !

External:

- Nodes fixed

- MaxTemp attributes has been changed for all items

- Locations of the components of the rover in the tech tree has been changed

- Textures reworked

- CrewModule now has a cargo compartment at the bottom for placing small items, such as extra batteries, a small fuel tanks or fuel cells

- Mod's structure restructured

- Rover's Ã‘Âabin is now opaque by default

- MM-patches has been added to enable transparent or mirror glass on cockpit ( on your choice), as well as for replace the stock interior to advanced one (Requires RPM 0.19.2 or higher and ASET_Props version 1.1 or higher!). Please read the file "readme" in the folder "Options" !!!

New in ERS IVA:

- Added simple internal, based on the stock (enabled by default)

"Advanced" RPM-based IVA mode is now optional

- Interior has been slightly modified

- Removed rigid dependence from RPM (FS and JSIPartUtils still needed!)

MFD:

- Added a special regime for the MFD for driving ("Drive mode")

Known issues:

- I have not yet understood the principle of work of stock thermo-mechanics and aerodynamics, so - the rover behavior in the atmosphere can be unpredictable

- Incorrect work of JSITransparentPod version 0.19.2 with rover's internal

Oh wow oh wow. You do amazing work. The detailing enriches the game so much. And this Rover is so much fun to assemble and career around in.

Salute you, dude. Awesome.
